scripts.build:workers: bun run test && mkdir -p dist/workers && bun build output/Test.Workers.FibonacciWorker/index.js --target=node --format=esm --outfile=dist/workers/FibonacciWorker.js && bun build output/Test.Workers.HashWorker/index.js --target=node --format=esm --outfile=dist/workers/HashWorker.js && bun build output/Test.Workers.CounterWorker/index.js --target=node --format=esm --outfile=dist/workers/CounterWorker.js
scripts.test: bun run build && bun run vitest run
scripts.example: bun run build && bun run example/server.ts
scripts.example:multithreaded: bun run build:workers && spago run --main Test.MultiThreadedServer.Example
scripts.example:server: bun run build && spago run --main Test.Server.Example
scripts.example:sharedcounter: bun run build:workers && spago run --main Test.SharedCounterServer.Example
